SageTVPlugin.Name: Season Premiere Borders for Guide
SageTVPlugin.Description:
Adds a red border to all shows in Guide that are considered Season Premieres and adds a yellow border to all shows in Guide that are
considered Series Premieres.
SageTVPlugin.Author: jorton
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 1.1 - Fixed Series Premieres not showing and made yellow vs red for season premieres. Version 1.0 - Adds red border to all
shows in Guide that are Season Premieres. Works with Default STV and Diamond UI Mod 3.3.
